summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Panaghia Food Delivery app - all backend APIs and frontend flows working correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs tested and working. Frontend cart state is managed in React local state (not persisted). Full order flow tested successfully.

frontend_tests.Order page: PASSED - cart items displayed, form submission works, order created successfully
